generated_body: If the user clicks on the article titled "The Real Reason McDonald's Keeps the Filet-O-Fish on Their Menu," they are likely to find an exploration of the strategic reasons behind the continued presence of this menu item. Additionally, it could delve into the competitive landscape of fast food, examining how this item helps McDonald's cater to diverse customer preferences. Overall, the content is expected to provide a thoughtful analysis of the Filet-O-Fish's role within the broader context of McDonald's menu offerings.
